dictionary.title: MicrobeMod_STD
dictionary.desc: Dictionary consisting of XXX terms plus XXX related synonyms. Some entries may also include the term's: source, description, wikidataID, chebiID, chebiName, FDAcode
dictionary.author: Emanuel Faria, President of ®Verriclear Natural Skin Essentials Ltd. https://www.verriclear.com

entry.description: An antobody binding to Chlamydia psittaci specific antigens, a microorganism that cuases the psittacosis infectious disease.
A substance that destroys or inhibits replication of viruses.

Treatment with a drug which interferes with the binding, fusion and entry of an HIV virion to a human cell. By blocking this step in HIVs replication cycle, such agents slow the progression from HIV infection to AIDS.
entry.synonym: anti-HIV theraoym fusion inhibitor drug treatment
antiHIV theraoym fusion inhibitor drug treatment
treatment with HIV fusion inhibitor activities
treatment with HIV fusion inhibitor activity
treatment with HIV fusion inhibitor agent
treatment with HIV fusion inhibitor drug
treatment with HIV fusion inhibitor medication
treatment with HIV fusion inhibitor therapy

entry.description: A compound or agent that combines with an enzyme in such a manner as to prevent the normal substrate-enzyme combination and the catalytic reaction.
Use of an inhibitor of HIV protease, an enzyme required for production of proteins needed for viral assembly.
entry.synonym: treatment with HIV protease inhibitor activities
treatment with HIV protease inhibitor activity
treatment with HIV protease inhibitor agent
treatment with HIV protease inhibitor drug
treatment with HIV protease inhibitor medication

entry.description: A compound or agent that combines with an enzyme in such a manner as to prevent the normal substrate-enzyme combination and the catalytic reaction.
